name: 3 Heroes
description:
Three Heroes!

Select your very own heroes in a fun free game and take them to the battlefield to wage war against hordes of enemies in this survival simulator!

Collect coins on your journey to level-up your army and obtain new abilities unique to each hero!

Survive for as long as you can, don't get overrun by the bad guys who will always be on the chase!


Meta:

Enemies scale with time, Enemies upto and including level 10 will have steady difficulty scaling, but from level 11 onwards the difficulty will increase dramatically.

Choose a hero to level up once your experience bar is full, each hero will have different levels, with sperate scaling and abilities. Heroes upto and including level 10 will recieve large improvements for each level-up, but from level 11 onwards the improvements will be lessened.

To gain experience points for your experience bar, collect coins found on the battlefield. Bronze coins provide 1 experience point, Silver coins provide 3, and Gold coins provide 10.

Google play store only.
